title: Eli & The Moonday
description: A stairway to the moon, a moon-cheese castle, the reason wolves howl at the moon, and the moon-queen â€¦ all these adventures await you this Moonday.Navy nights and star-shine are wonderous, but the Moonday only calls once in a while. Moondays are mysterious, and if one comes so shall we not turn from the path, less it not come again.Eli with his wolfcub ears hears the call for adventure. Light-footed and full of dancey, Eli follows the path spilled out to him on a great goodnight venture that leads him on marvelous moon-built landscapes and calls on his moon-citizen friends, leaving him sleepy and happy to dream of future adventures.
author: Ashton  Smith
